meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of endomitosis.
meanings.sent1: The endomitotic process occurs within the cell.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the endomitotic behavior of the cells.
meanings.sent3: The endomitotic dance of the cells was quite fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent4: The endomitotic nature of the cells was like a hidden dance party.
meanings.sent5: The endomitotic characteristics of the cells were mesmerizing under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: The endomitotic cells were multiplying rapidly.
meanings.sent2: The patient's condition was due to the endomitotic process.
meanings.sent3: The endomitotic race of the cells was quite competitive.
meanings.sent4: The endomitotic journey of the cells was like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The endomitotic transformation of the cells was both astonishing and beautiful.
